name: Pleasant Hearth 34" Elizabeth Natural Slate Fire Pit
categoryPath: Patio & Garden/Patio & Outdoor Decor/Fire Pits & Patio Heaters

reviews.name: Pleasant Hearth 34" Elizabeth Natural Slate Fire Pit
reviews.reviewText: This product is much nicer in person. It arrived 2 days after I placed my order. It was fairly easy to assemble. The only negative was we were missing one of the bolts that we needed to attach the handle to the top piece.
reviews.title: Very nice looking

reviews.name: Pleasant Hearth 34" Elizabeth Natural Slate Fire Pit
reviews.reviewText:
IT IS SUMMER TIME SO I DID NOT WANT TO PUT A FIRE IN IT YET .. SO I TOOK THE
FAKE LOGS FROM MY HOUSE FIRE PLACE AND WASH THEM OFF AND PUT THREE OF
THEM IN MY NEW HEARTH AND UNDER THE LOG'S TWO 6" fake CANDLE (with self timer)
WOW! SO NICE IT COME ON EVERY NIGHT A 8:00 EVERYONE THAT SEE IT LOVE IT.
I ALSO PUT IT CANDLES IN MY HOME FIRE PLACE IT LOOKS SO NICE BECAUSE THESE
CANDLE HAVE A LITTLE FLICKING LOOK SO REAL. TRY IT YOU LIKE IT FOR THE
SUMMER TIME AND THEN IN WINTER YOU CAN MAKE A REAL FIRE. ONE MORE THINK
MY CANDLE DID MELT A LITTLE BECAUSE OF THE HOT SUN BUT I LIKE I THINK IT
LOOKS EVEN . (YOU CAN BUY CANDLE AT WALMART) I BOUGHT MINE AT COSTCO.
WE SET AROUND THE HEARTH AND SET OUR WINE GLASS ON THE RIM .
I REALLY LOVE THE LOOK TRY IT YOU WILL LOVE IT..
reviews.title: VERY NICE LOOKING AND GOOD PRICE

reviews.name: Pleasant Hearth 34" Elizabeth Natural Slate Fire Pit
reviews.reviewText: I think I really would have liked this product if it arrived in good shape. Unfortunately it was shipped Round the country for 7 days before arriving at my door. When I unpacked it there were many parts damaged bent and broken. Cover was bent and would not sit on pit, tiles on outer ring were busted out, and the screen was so deformed I could not even install handle. I was very disappointed!!
reviews.title: Busted up in shipping

reviews.name: Pleasant Hearth 34" Elizabeth Natural Slate Fire Pit
reviews.reviewText: I love the multifunctional feature. Legs are solid and mosaic top is beautiful. A synch to put together.
reviews.title: Beautiful and solid fire pit

reviews.name: Pleasant Hearth 34" Elizabeth Natural Slate Fire Pit
reviews.reviewText:
Satisfied with performance.
The protective cover should have been included.
reviews.title: Great for the price.
